text: Murphy James Foster, Jr., known as Mike Foster (July 11, 1930 - October 4, 2020) was an American politician. He served as the 53rd Governor of Louisiana. He served from January 1996 until January 2004. Foster is a businessman, landowner, and sportsman in St. Mary Parish. Foster died in Franklin, Louisiana on October 4, 2020 at the age of 90.Former Louisiana Gov. Mike Foster dies at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== *State of Louisiana – Biography *DuBos, Clancy. “Foster on Fire.” Gambit Weekly.
